trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示在設計階段將控制項的檢視已發生的事件種類。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A ViewEvent object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: ViewEvent 物件由提供給設計工具元件設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，當引發事件上控制項的設計階段檢視的特定使用者動作所造成。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>事件由處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派方法，會採用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件做為參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a ViewEvent object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>類別是 ViewEvent 物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static ViewEvent fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派方法會比較<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性到靜態 ViewEvent 欄位以判斷哪一種動作引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances: - You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，在下列情況下會引發事件:-您可以按一下設計介面上的區域。

trans-unit.source: - The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -此設計工具會在設計介面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: - You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: -您輸入，或結束範本編輯模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別提供的預設委派處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 自訂控制項設計工具覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法來處理這些事件的設計介面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主應用程式初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件的設計介面，然後傳遞時的動作類型物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>物件可指出哪一種動作:-<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>屬性提供事件引數所特有的動作類型。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: 表示檢視事件所引發的設計工具區域上按一下。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派方法會比較<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>靜態屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>欄位，以判斷哪一種動作引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Click to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>物件是否等於按一下來指出您按一下設計介面上的區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別會提供預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Click, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果按一下 事件型別，會呼叫委派<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法以處理在設計階段按區域上的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數，表示已按下的設計工具區域，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示檢視事件所引發的設計介面上的控制項繪製。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派方法會比較<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>靜態屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>欄位，以判斷哪一種動作引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Paint to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>物件是否等於 [小畫家]，表示在設計介面上的控制項上的 [小畫家] 事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別會提供預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Paint, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件類型是 [小畫家]，委派會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>方法以處理在設計階段按區域上的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 表示檢視事件所引發的變更範本模式的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派方法會比較<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>靜態屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>欄位，以判斷哪一種動作引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to TemplateModeChanged to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>物件是否等於 TemplateModeChanged 表示範本編輯模式變更為設計介面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>類別會提供預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is TemplateModeChanged, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件類型是 TemplateModeChanged，委派設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自的自訂設計工具<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>類別可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>方法，以執行額外處理時的樣板編輯模式變更為設計介面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
